name: RAIDEN HAKUSAN
description:
The fate of Tokyo is in your hands!

Choose your favorite kawaii-desu waifu out of four different anime characters, then blast a never-ending stream of baka gaijin yôkai enemies to bits and bytes!

One of my old Jam games, in a polished post-jam version with a graphical overhaul and tweaked gameplay balance for the optimal danmaku experience. Chiptune music, 8-bit sprites, and the hardcore gameplay from the arcades you remember - but no need to stuff quarters in it!

So what's this game all about?
  • 4 playable characters with different playstyle and attacks!
  • Explosive wave-based gameplay with ever-increasing difficulty!
  • Unique enemy patterns make every wave interesting!
  • Collect hearts for extra lives, but they also increase your score multiplier! Play efficiently to boost your score massively!
  • Awesome chiptune soundtrack by Drozerix!
  • High-contrast retro graphics that are both colorblind-friendly and photosensitive epilepsy-friendly!
  • Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, whichever you prefer - comfortable to play both as a lefty and a righty!
  • A retro experience with more than a dash of Japan!
  • Extensive character BIOSes gives you an excuse to spend ages jammin' in the menus!
